titleInfo.title: 'File 28/32 Labour for Arabian American Oil Company, Bahrain & Dhahran'

physicalDescription.extent: The documents in the file are arranged in chronological order. There are notes at the end of the file (folio 17). The notes refer to documents within the file; they give a brief description of the correspondence with a reference number in red ink, which refers back to that correspondence in the file.

The foliation is written in pencil, circled, and can be found in the top corner of the recto of each folio. The numbering commences at the front cover with 1 and 1A and then it carries on until 19, which is the last number given on the back cover.

mods.abstract: The file contains correspondence between the Arabian American Oil Company (ARAMCO) representatives and the Political Agents at Bahrain and Kuwait on transit permits for employees and on death during service of ARAMCO employees.
